credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Bill and Professor Butts and Boob McNutt: Poor Pearl...Queen of Tomania| Are You Saving Jokers?
inscriptions: u.l. embossed: [Strathmore stamp]; u.l. stamped in red: MAR 18 1934; u.c. in pencil: 3049; u.r. stamped in red: MAR 18 1934; stamped in red along margins: MAR 18 1934; c.l. in pencil: 3049; c.r. in pencil: 3049; l.r. in image in ink: RUBE/ GOLDBERG; l.r. in ink: MARCH-18, 1934; verso l.l. in pencil: 13,1 [encircled]; verso l.r. in pencil: 9[encircled]
